sentences.en: A tussle at the Oxford Union ends in a creditable draw.
sentences.cn: 在牛津联盟,争斗以值得嘉许的平局告终.

sentences.en: Alice's record of perfect attendance is very creditable to her.
sentences.cn: 艾丽斯从不缺席的记录真是值得称赞的.

sentences.en: Experience, however, might supply us with very creditable imitations of it.
sentences.cn: 然而经验能给我们提供非常可靠的摹拟品.
加扎以优异的成绩获得了三级荣誉学位。

sentences.en: Good price will be for creditable business partner.
sentences.cn: 好价格将是可信的商业合作伙伴.

sentences.en: He is a scholarly clergyman , and creditable to the cloth.
sentences.cn: 他是个有学问的教士, 从没玩忽职守.

sentences.en: It was a very creditable result for the team.
sentences.cn: 对这支队来说，这比赛结果是十分值得称道的。

sentences.en: My governess found me out a very creditable sort of man to manage it.
sentences.cn: 我们保姆替我找了一位很有名望的人来办这件事.

sentences.en: Not a very creditable attitude, I'm afraid.
sentences.cn: 这种态度恐怕不怎么道德。

sentences.en: She did a creditable job of impersonating the singer.
sentences.cn: 她把那位歌手模仿得惟妙惟肖。

sentences.en: The development of business is creditable to your co - operation.
sentences.cn: 业务的发展归功于你方的合作.

sentences.en: The invention of the engine is creditable to Watt.
sentences.cn: 发动机的发明归功于瓦特.

sentences.en: The rebellious dragon was quite humbled and subdued, and became a most creditable younger brother.
sentences.cn: 这个当年强头蹶脑的骑兵现在变得低心小胆, 成了个很不错的弟弟了.

sentences.en: The report that Mr. Lin has done a creditable job is credible.
sentences.cn: 报告说,林先生做了一件值得赞许的工作,这是可信的.

sentences.en: The team produced a creditable performance .
Their affection and pleasure in meeting was just enough to make a very creditable appearance.
sentences.cn: 相见时,他们的激动和喜悦足以构成一副令人欣羡的情景.

sentences.en: They turned out a quite creditable performance.
sentences.cn: 他们上演了一场相当精彩的表演。

words.tran_cn: 信用，信誉；[金融] 贷款；学分；信任；声望
相信，信任；把…归给，归功于；赞颂
声誉好的,可钦佩的,可信任的

trans.tran_cn: 值得称赞的，合乎道德的
